parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer:
# Your expected output when the player start the project.
# For example,
# Welcome to BashCrawl!
# You are in a starting point.
# To move, please type w(up), a(left), s(down), d(right) or ls(look around) or ? for help.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer:
# BashCrawl Help
# w(up), a(left), s(down), d(right) or ls(look around) to move around.
l - list of current items in your inventory.
p - pick up item from the room or place where you are now.
p u(up) - return to last place visited.
? - this help screen.
exit game

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Invalid selection, please try again.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: # Your expected output when the player start the game.

parameter.name: help_in_game
parameter.answer: h

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer:
# BashCrawl Help
# w(up), a(left), s(down), d(right) or ls(look around) to move around.
l - list of current items in your inventory.
p - pick up item from the room or place where you are now.
p u(up) - return to last place visited.
? - this help screen.
exit game
